<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For loongarch64 we want to emit the following pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lxray&#95;sled&#95;beginN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   B .Lxray&#95;sled&#95;endN</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   11 NOPs (44 bytes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lxray&#95;sled&#95;endN:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need the extra bytes because at runtime they may be used for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actual pattern defined at compiler-rt/lib/xray/xray&#95;loongarch64.cpp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The count here should be adjusted accordingly if the implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int8&#95;t NoopsInSledCount = 11;</span></CodeLine>
